actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, DOD, DOE, Justice.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend the Freedom of Information Act to exempt naval nuclear propulsion information from disclosure in the absence of finding that such disclosure will not be inimical to the interests of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Freedom of Information Act to exempt naval nuclear propulsion information from disclosure unless the Secretary of Defense and the Secretary of Energy determine that such disclosure would not be inimical to the interests of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Freedom of Information Act to exempt naval nuclear propulsion information from disclosure in the absence of finding that such disclosure will not be inimical to the interests of the United States.
